bio: Mantis Audiogram is an experimental electronic artist blending world music influences with modern production. Known for incorporating traditional Greek instruments like the bouzouki with synthesizers and digital soundscapes.

albums.title: Bouzoukidelic
albums.description: A psychedelic journey through Mediterranean soundscapes, merging traditional Greek bouzouki with electronic production. This debut album explores themes of cultural identity, mysticism, and the ocean's eternal rhythms.
albums.label: Independent

tracks.title: Bouzoukidelic
tracks.description: The title track sets the tone with cascading bouzouki melodies over pulsing synth bass.

tracks.title: Goumenissa
tracks.description: Named after the wine region in Northern Greece, this track evokes memories of vineyard sunsets and ancient traditions.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Red hills rising in the morning mist
Vines that whisper secrets time has kissed
In Goumenissa where the old ways stay
We dance beneath the sun's eternal sway

Chorus:
Goumenissa, land of wine and stone
In your valleys I have found my home
Every grape holds stories yet untold
Goumenissa, more precious than gold

Verse 2:
Grandfather's hands upon the weathered vine
Generations flowing like the wine
The harvest moon will guide us through the night
In Goumenissa everything feels right

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
παλιά τραγούδια (old songs)
νέα όνειρα (new dreams)
Goumenissa, you're calling me

[Chorus repeats]

tracks.title: Ocean within
tracks.description: An introspective journey exploring the inner depths of consciousness, comparing the mind to an endless ocean.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Beneath the surface where the light grows dim
There's an ocean vast within
Waves of memory crash and fade
In the depths where dreams are made

Chorus:
There's an ocean within me
Deeper than the Aegean Sea
Every tide, every storm I've been
Lives in the ocean within

Verse 2:
Dive down past the shallow breath
Where fear and hope dance close to death
In the silence, in the blue
I find pieces of the truth

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Calm on the surface
Chaos below
The ocean within me
Only I know

Verse 3:
Salt and sorrow, joy and pain
All dissolved in the same refrain
I am the sailor and the sea
The ocean within is me

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: Your face
tracks.description: A tender love song about the moment you realize someone has captured your heart completely.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I see your face in every crowd
Even when you're not around
The way you smile, the way you move
I'm lost and I don't want to be found

Chorus:
Your face, your face
It's all I see in this place
Your eyes, your grace
Time and space erase
When I see your face

Verse 2:
Morning light upon your skin
Where do I end and you begin?
Every feature memorized
I'm falling deeper in

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Close my eyes and you appear
Crystal clear, drawing near
Your face is home to me

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: Opa!
tracks.description: A high-energy celebration track that brings traditional Greek party energy into the electronic realm.
tracks.lyrics:
Opa! Opa! Opa!
Όπα! Ελάτε! (Come on!)

Verse 1:
Break the plates and raise your glass
Tonight we dance, forget the past
Bouzouki screaming through the night
Everything will be alright

Chorus:
Opa! Feel the rhythm take control
Opa! Let the music free your soul
Opa! Spinning faster, losing ground
Opa! This is where we're found

Verse 2:
Feet are flying, bodies sway
We'll dance until the break of day
Generations in this song
Opa! Come and sing along

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Χόρεψε! (Dance!)
Τραγούδα! (Sing!)
Ζήσε! (Live!)
Opa!

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: Yellow snake
tracks.description: A darker, more experimental track exploring themes of temptation and transformation through serpentine soundscapes.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Yellow snake slides through the grass
Silent shadow as you pass
Hypnotic eyes that pull me near
Should I follow, should I fear?

Chorus:
Yellow snake, show me the way
Through the garden where I'll stay
Yellow snake, wisdom or sin?
Let the transformation begin

Verse 2:
Shedding skin beneath the moon
Chanting an ancient tune
Venom or enlightenment?
In your coils, I'm heaven sent

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Winding, binding, finding truth
Yellow snake of eternal youth
Bite me once and set me free
Yellow snake, transform me

[Chorus repeats]

Outro:
Slither away, yellow snake
Leave me here in your wake

tracks.title: Bouki
tracks.description: A playful homage to the bouzouki itself, showcasing the instrument's versatility in modern production.

tracks.title: Bouzpooky
tracks.description: The album's haunting closer, where the bouzouki takes on an otherworldly quality, drifting through ethereal soundscapes.
tracks.lyrics:
[Instrumental with vocal samples]

[Whispered vocals throughout]:
"In the shadows..."
"Bouzouki whispers..."
"Spirits dancing..."
"Fading... fading..."

albums.title: Love Songs 1
albums.description: An intimate collection of modern love songs exploring romance from multiple perspectives. Each track captures different facets of love - passion, vulnerability, obsession, and devotion.
albums.label: Independent

tracks.title: All the way - His version
tracks.description: The male perspective of an all-consuming love. Part of a dual narrative with 'Her version'.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I've walked a thousand miles in circles
Searching for what I found in you
Every wrong turn led me somewhere
Now I know what I have to do

Chorus:
I'll go all the way for you
Cross every ocean, split the sky in two
No distance is too far, no mountain too high
I'll go all the way for you, or die trying

Verse 2:
They said I was a fool for loving
Someone who lives beyond my reach
But I'd rather be a fool who's trying
Than safe within these empty streets

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
All the way, all the way
Nothing's gonna stand in my way
All the way, all the way
For you I'll go all the way

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: All the way - Her version
tracks.description: The female perspective of the same love story, revealing new emotional layers and vulnerability.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I built these walls so high around me
Swore I'd never let anyone inside
Then you appeared like unexpected sunrise
And suddenly I can't hide

Chorus:
You came all the way for me
Crossed every ocean, split the sky in three
No distance was too far, no mountain too high
You came all the way for me, now I'm alive

Verse 2:
I was so scared of being broken
So I broke hearts before they broke mine
But you saw through my armor and my anger
And loved me anyway, this time

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
All the way, all the way
You showed me love doesn't have to fade
All the way, all the way
For you I'd go all the way

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: Not gonna stop
tracks.description: An upbeat declaration of relentless pursuit and unwavering dedication in love.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
You can run to Paris, Tokyo, or Rome
You can change your number, disconnect your phone
You can tell your friends that I'm no good for you
But I'm not gonna stop loving you

Chorus:
I'm not gonna stop, not gonna quit
Not gonna let you forget
What we had was real, what we had was right
I'm not gonna stop, I'll fight all night
For us

Verse 2:
You can say you're over me, you can play it cool
You can date a hundred people, break every rule
But when you're lying in bed at 3 AM
You'll know that I'm not stopping then

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Not gonna stop (no)
Not gonna drop (no)
This feeling that we've got
Not gonna stop

Verse 3:
Maybe I'm crazy, maybe I'm a fool
But I know what's real and I know what's true
So I'm not gonna stop

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: I'm your man
tracks.description: A soulful promise of devotion and reliability, inspired by classic soul ballads.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
When the world gets heavy on your shoulders
And you need someone to understand
When the night gets colder and you're feeling older
Baby, I'm your man

Chorus:
I'm your man, through thick and thin
I'm your man, again and again
When you're lost, I'll help you find your way back
I'm your man, and that's a fact

Verse 2:
When your dreams feel distant and fading
When you need a hand to hold
When your faith needs saving, when your heart is aching
I'll be there, brave and bold

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
I'm not perfect, I'm not a saint
But my love for you has no restraint
I'm your shelter in the storm
I'm your fire keeping you warm

Verse 3:
I'm your man, your lover, your friend
I'm your man until the end
I'm your man, your constant, your truth
I'm your man, and I choose you

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: Come with me
tracks.description: An invitation to escape together and build a new life, mixing romance with wanderlust.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I've got a map with no destination
I've got a car and some determination
I've got two hands and they're reaching for you
Saying come with me, we'll start something new

Chorus:
Come with me, leave it all behind
Come with me, we'll see what we find
Pack light, hold tight, we'll chase the sun
Come with me, let's run

Verse 2:
We'll sleep in motels and wake up in wonder
We'll dance in the rain and laugh at the thunder
We'll make our mistakes and we'll make them together
Come with me, forever and ever

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
No plans, no maps, no turning back
Just you and me on this one-way track
The world is waiting, can't you see?
So come with me, come with me

Verse 3:
We'll write our story in the stars above
We'll paint our future in shades of love
Just say yes and give me your hand
Come with me to the promised land

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Come with me...
Come with me...

tracks.title: Then I saw your face
tracks.description: The transformative moment of seeing someone and knowing your life has changed forever.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I was walking through my life like a ghost
Going through the motions, playing my role
Everything was gray, everything was numb
Then I saw your face and I came undone

Chorus:
Then I saw your face and the world turned gold
Then I saw your face and I lost control
Every color brighter, every sound more clear
Then I saw your face and suddenly I'm here

Verse 2:
I was barely breathing, barely alive
Just surviving, trying to get by
Then you smiled at me across that crowded room
And my heart remembered how to bloom

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Now I'm awake, now I'm alive
Now I know what it means to thrive
All because of you, your grace
The moment that I saw your face

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Then I saw your face
Then I saw your face
And everything changed

tracks.title: Saturday
tracks.description: A sweet ode to the simple joy of spending lazy Saturdays with the one you love.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Wake up slow, nowhere to be
Sunlight dancing, you next to me
Coffee brewing, radio plays
I want every week to feel like Saturday

Chorus:
Saturday with you is all I need
Saturday, where time moves at our speed
No rush, no worry, just you and me
Saturday love is the only life I need

Verse 2:
Pancakes burning, we don't care
Your messy hair, your underwear
Dancing in the kitchen to our song
On Saturday nothing can go wrong

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Monday through Friday I'm counting down
To Saturday when you're around
Every moment simple and true
Saturday is me and you

[Chorus repeats]

Outro:
Every day should feel like Saturday
With you, every day should feel like Saturday

tracks.title: Big brown eyes
tracks.description: An intimate closing track focusing on the small details that make someone unforgettable.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Big brown eyes that see right through me
Like I'm made of glass and truth
Big brown eyes that make me weak
Every time they look at me

Chorus:
Big brown eyes, I'm drowning in
Big brown eyes, pull me in
I could stare forever and never grow tired
Big brown eyes have me inspired

Verse 2:
The way they crinkle when you laugh
The way they darken when you're mad
The way they soften in the morning light
Big brown eyes keep me up at night

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
I've memorized every fleck of gold
Every story they've told
Every secret that they hold
Big brown eyes, never grow old

Verse 3:
When I'm lost you guide me home
When I'm scared I'm not alone
Your big brown eyes, they tell me so
Everything I need to know

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Big brown eyes
My lullaby
Big brown eyes
Goodnight

singles.title: Take it Slow
singles.description: The latest single exploring the beauty of patience in a fast-paced world. A return to electronic roots with a more mature, measured approach.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Everyone's racing to the finish line
But I've learned to take my time
Rushing never got me anywhere
Except further from what I hold dear

Chorus:
Take it slow, let it breathe
Take it slow, that's what I believe
Good things come to those who wait
Take it slow, don't tempt fate

Verse 2:
The world spins fast but we spin faster
Chasing after some disaster
I'm stepping back, I'm slowing down
Finding peace in solid ground

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Slow down, slow down
Let the moment surround you now
Slow down, slow down
This is how

[Chorus repeats x2]

singles.title: Users are the Used
singles.description: A scathing two-track EP examining digital exploitation and technological alienation. Raw, industrial-tinged electronic music with a message.
singles.label: Independent

tracks.title: Users are the Used
tracks.description: The title track confronting the dark reality of user exploitation in the digital age.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Click agree, sign away your soul
Your data mined, you've lost control
Free service comes at quite a cost
Your privacy and freedom lost

Chorus:
Users are the used
Your attention is the product consumed
Users are the used
In this digital asylum, abused

Verse 2:
Algorithms learn your every move
Target you with nothing to prove
You think you're free but you're the slave
Scrolling toward an early grave

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Wake up! Disconnect!
Demand some respect!
You're not the customer, you're the merchandise
Wake up! Open your eyes!

[Chorus repeats]

Verse 3:
They sell your face, they sell your voice
They made you think you had a choice
But users are the used, it's true
And they're profiting off of you

[Chorus repeats x2]

tracks.title: 10,000 machines
tracks.description: A relentless industrial track painting a picture of humanity consumed by machine logic.
tracks.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Ten thousand machines processing our thoughts
Ten thousand machines deciding what we're taught
Ten thousand machines controlling the feed
Ten thousand machines creating our need

Chorus:
Ten thousand machines
Ten thousand screens
Ten thousand machines
Living in between

Verse 2:
We built them to serve but now we obey
We built them to help but they lead us astray
Ten thousand machines with ten thousand eyes
Watching, learning, weaponizing lies

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Machine noise, machine voice
Machine logic, no choice
Machine future, machine past
How long can we last?

[Chorus repeats]

Outro:
Ten thousand machines
Ten thousand machines
And we're caught in between
Ten thousand machines

singles.title: What do you not need
singles.description: A minimalist meditation on consumerism and the liberation found in letting go. Sparse production mirrors the lyrical theme.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
What do you not need?
All these things you hold
What do you not need?
The stories you've been sold

Chorus:
Let it go, let it fall
You never needed it at all
What do you not need?
Find freedom in the call

Verse 2:
What do you not need?
The weight upon your back
What do you not need?
The things that hold you back

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Less is more, they say
But we accumulate each day
What if we let it slip away?
What would remain, what would stay?

Verse 3:
What do you not need?
Perhaps you'll come to see
What do you not need?
Might set you free

[Chorus repeats x2]

singles.title: Whatcha gonna do (feat. Suno)
singles.description: An upbeat collaboration with AI music platform Suno, exploring the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence in music production.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
When the world comes knocking at your door
Asking for something you've never given before
When the pressure's on and time is running out
Whatcha gonna do? What's it all about?

Chorus:
Whatcha gonna do when the moment arrives?
Whatcha gonna do to feel alive?
Whatcha gonna do, it's up to you
Whatcha gonna do? Whatcha gonna do?

Verse 2:
When the old ways fail and the new ways call
When you're standing there with your back against the wall
When the future's knocking and the past is through
Whatcha gonna do? It's all on you

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
(Suno AI vocals)
Compute, execute, create something new
Human and machine, me and you
Together we'll find what we can do
The answer is waiting, coming through

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Whatcha gonna do?
Whatcha gonna do?
The choice is yours
Whatcha gonna do?

singles.title: Love this world
singles.description: An optimistic anthem celebrating the beauty of existence despite its challenges. Released as a holiday gift to fans.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Wake up to the sunrise painting gold
Another story waiting to be told
Despite the chaos, despite the pain
I'd choose this life again and again

Chorus:
I love this world with all its flaws
I love this world despite its wars
The beauty outweighs the hurt somehow
I love this world, here and now

Verse 2:
Strangers smiling on a crowded train
Children laughing, dancing in the rain
Music playing from an open door
I couldn't ask for anything more

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Yes, it's broken, yes, it's tough
But love, there's still enough
To make me want to stay
To make me love each day

Verse 3:
Sunsets bleeding into violet skies
Truth surviving in between the lies
Hope persisting when all seems lost
I love this world, whatever the cost

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
I love this world
This beautiful, broken world
I love this world

singles.title: Enough
singles.description: A powerful statement of self-worth and boundaries. The track that launched Mantis Audiogram into wider recognition.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
I gave you chances, I gave you time
I gave you reasons, I gave you rhyme
I gave you patience, I gave you grace
But now I'm done, get out of my face

Chorus:
Enough is enough
I've had enough
You can't break me, I'm too tough
Enough is enough
I'm calling your bluff
Enough, enough, enough

Verse 2:
I gave you trust, you gave me lies
I gave you love, you gave me cries
I gave you everything I had
But I'm taking back what you made me sad

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
I am enough, I am strong
I was right, you were wrong
I deserve better than this
I deserve happiness and bliss

Verse 3:
So here's goodbye, here's the door
I won't take this anymore
Enough is enough, I'm breaking free
I'm finally choosing me

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Enough... I am enough
Enough... I am enough

singles.title: Connective
singles.description: The debut single that introduced Mantis Audiogram's unique sound - a meditation on human connection in the digital age.
singles.label: Independent
singles.lyrics:
Verse 1:
We're all connected by invisible thread
Through fiber optic cables, through words unsaid
A billion people, yet we're all alone
Staring at screens, pretending we're home

Chorus:
Connective tissue breaks down
Connective, we're losing ground
Connective, can you hear the sound?
Of humanity unbound

Verse 2:
We share our lives but hide our truth
We project perfection, disguise our proof
That we're all broken, searching for real
Something to touch, something to feel

[Chorus repeats]

Bridge:
Reach through the screen
Find what it means
To truly connect
To truly be seen

Verse 3:
Maybe connection isn't digital
Maybe it's physical, spiritual
Maybe we need to look up from the glow
And remember what we used to know

[Chorus repeats x2]

Outro:
Connective...
Connective...
We're all connective...
Trying to be connective...
